text: 'Ey, we ready!

Watch our inner light
change the world.
( laughter )

So, Yolanda,
I got a question for you.

Because you have inspired
just so many people,

what are some stories
you hope to tell in the future?

I hope to not only tell stories,
but take a lot of action.

You are all using
your platform for good

and being activists
through storytelling,

and you're supposed
to have fun with activism.

My favorite thing
about storytelling

is that it's like sharing
a family heirloom.
You pass down different stories.

No matter how many times
you tell a story,

there are always different
ways to tell it.

I just think it's so fun to just
tell different perspectives
and to be able to tell stories

that are often
not told right now.

More stories
with Black people, you know,
shown in a positive light.

- Dara: Yes.
- You know, like succeeding,

they have great jobs,
you know?

Just like they have
a normal life.

- All: Yes!
- Christian: Right?

- Black excellence.
- Dara: Yes! Greatness.
